author: ruthg1980
title: Very nice atmosphere, Super nice staff, very comfortable, clean, quiet, relaxing..
text: I had the best time in this hotel. I arrived early and the staff made all possible to prepare my room as fast as possible. The room was big, quiet, clean, luxurious. Bed comfortable. I didn't want to leave. And the place is located in the best place in Paris, lots of restaurants, and bars around, near main metro stations etc..
